results.title: Diggers
results.creator_credit: Don Scheldrup, Vincent Donovan and Australia. Dept. of Defence. Public Relations
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Sentinel”.
Despite the advanced state of military technology it is still the “Digger” who determines the success or otherwise of the Australian Army. It is the infantry soldier who must find the enemy, capture his territory and fight him at close quarters.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Don Scheldrup, Vincent Donovan and Australia. Dept. of Defence. Public Relations

results.title: The Animation game
results.brief_description: Designed for teachers and students, this film is an introduction to animating on film. Covers drawn, model, cut-out and pixilation animation techniques. Geoffrey Rush stars as the Professor. Animation by David Johnson. Suitable for upper primary, secondary and tertiary levels.

results.title: Confusion
results.creator_credit: Scottish Health Education Unit and Sidhartha Films
results.brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “Health education and the elderly”.
An elderly woman is found ill and confused by her neighbour. We follow the process of hospital admission through her eyes. The film stresses the importance of correct initial diagnosis and the importance of sympathetic attitudes from medical staff.

results.title: Rural industries
results.creator_credit: John Leake, Peter Johnson, Film Australia and Motion Picture Associates
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Australia in the 80’s”.
Australia’s modern techniques of cultivation and harvesting are demonstrated to show how this country is a major supplier of grain to the world. The film also shows how the cattle and livestock industry supply food to most parts of the globe.

results.title: Earthly beings
results.creator_credit: Chuck Eyler, Jacolyn Kildare and Heaping Teaspoon Animation

results.title: Mexico: a family style menu
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “World of Cooking”.
Joaquin Guzman has been a chef for over twenty-five years. He takes immense pride in his craft, his position and his country’s long history.

results.title: A New Deal?
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Rich World Poor World”.
About 10000 people around the world die every day from lack of food. Are we really heading for global disaster? What can the world do to help itself? This and other questions about world poverty are discussed
